markdownRemark.html:
I wrote on the card for your basket, furious still for your attitude that morning.  With all that anger, I failed to write my feelings better… my true feelings.  When I left the florist I realized that I didnt give you justice. I was so ridden with guilt, halfway thru Shaw MRT I thought of going back. Even with the phony indifference, I was worried of how you would feel.

You can be so difficult sometimes and yet I can’t spend the day without you. You’ve struck a nerve a couple of times but I’ll ignore it just to be with you a little longer. Patience is a must in any relationship more so with you. J Well I don’t mind, that’s what love is .. never having to say or stay sorry . J  Well Ok, I made that one up, but still its true… at least that’s how I feel.

The truth is, no matter what we go through each day, you’re my angel, my happiness and my life. I will never be lost as long as you’re beside me. You are, clichés aside, my true north.

I love you Baby! I will always will. Happy Valentines Day!

XXOO
your potato
